audio_sermons.title: Forms of Godliness vs. Conformity to Christ
audio_sermons.description: The Bible commands many outward forms of godliness for Christians to obey, but an unspiritual and carnal person may manifest many forms of godliness without inward Christ-likeness. In the last days, Paul told Timothy that men would have “a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof” (2 Timothy 3:5). God wants to conform us to the image of His Son Jesus Christ, that He may live His life through us.
